The benefit of the television is that his children will have something to do for fun because for now they leave the house and go out with the neighbors. For this reason, José is looking for a loan of five thousand quetzals and with his earnings he will be able to pay the amounts established in the payment plan. His dream is to continue furnishing his home little by little.

loans.use: to buy a television

loans.name: Betronila's Group

texts.en:
Betronila is 48 years old and has five children. She has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is always said to be a very friendly person. Even though Betronila is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group, formed by 14 farmers in Matete District, Kenya.

Betronila started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2011, and decided to do so because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since then, she has seen her life improve, especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers.

Betronila’s Group will receive farming supplies to plant a total of 8.75 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of eight solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase electrical supplies in order to renovate the house.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro: Es un joven luchador, originario de Puerto Cabezas, soltero, divorciado, tiene un pequeño hijo de un mes de nacido. Trabaja como técnico en el Ministerio de Educación. Está solicitando financiamiento para iniciar a construir su vivienda de tambo de madera, ya que actualmente habita en casa de familiares. Con el préstamo podrá comprar madera cepillada, clavos, zinc, postes de madera y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es  tener una vivienda más segura y en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Alejandro is a hard working young man, originally from Puerto Cabezas. He is divorced and has a 1 month old son.  He works as a technician at the Ministry of Education. 
He is asking for a loan to start construction on his wooden stilt-house, since he is currently living at a relative’s house.
With this loan, he’ll be able to buy planed timber, nails, zinc, studs and to cover labor costs. His dreams is to have a safer home in good condition.

loans.use: build his wooden stilt-house.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco Antonio, actualmente labora en un ministerio de educación de la zona donde vive, desempeñándose como mensajero hace seis año, soltero con tres persona a su cargo tiene la necesidad de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda atreves del financiamiento con Ceprodel, este crédito lo utilizara en la Compra de zinc, perlines, pintura y mano de obra.
Con este crédito va a poder repara el techo de su vivienda que se encuentran en mal estado y darle una condición de vida mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco Antonio currently works in a Ministry of Education close to where he lives. He has worked there as a messenger for six years. He is single and has three people who depend on him.

He has the need to improve his housing conditions. That is why he requests this loan from Ceprodel, that he will use to buy zinc sheets, beams, paint and to pay hired labor.

With this loan he will be able to repair the roof of his house that is in poor condition and to give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheets, beams, paint and to pay hired labor.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: Jose de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el posee un negocio ubicado en el mercado municipal desde hace varios años donde vende hamacas y lazos, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para poder surtir su negocio y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Jose, 51 years of age, lives in his own home with his family. He has had a business located in the municipal market for many years where he sells hammocks and rope. He has a lot of customers because of his good prices.

With what he earns from his sales, he is able to cover household expenses.

He is applying for a loan to buy more merchandise wholesale to be able to stock his business and earn more money.

loans.use: to buy hammocks and rope wholesale.

loans.name: Erika Margarita

texts.es: Erika de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de ropa de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad del producto y los buenos pecios, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa para damas y caballeros por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
32-year old Erika lives in her own house with her husband and son. She has earned her living for several years selling clothing in the streets of different communities. She has many customers because of the quality products she sells and the fair prices she charges.

Erika is seeking a loan to buy clothing for men and women at wholesale prices. Then she can continue her business, her sole source of income.

loans.use: buy clothing for men and women at wholesale prices

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en:
Vicent is a thirty-three-year-old hardworking man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He has been able to look after his family and educate his children from his wholesale shop business in addition to farming and motorcycle transport. High taxation, license fees and inadequate capital are his main problems. However, he hopes to improve his business to increase his income and become a prominent businessman.

He needs a loan to buy more stock like bags of sugar, boxes of soap and others to sell.

loans.use: to buy more stock like bags of sugar, boxes of soap and others to sell.

loans.name: Jose Fernando

texts.es: Jose de 35 años de edad viven casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a realizar viajes en su pick up desde hace varios años, tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, Jose está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose is 35 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and two children. He has been making a living for several years by making trips with his pick-up truck and has many clients who prefer him due to the responsibility he shows when driving.
What he makes from his work, he uses to pay his household expenses.

Jose is requesting a loan to purchase tires and maintain his vehicle, since it's his only source of work, and to be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase tires and maintain his vehicle

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: Jose Luis, tiene la edad  de 38 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y sus hijos los cuales su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y así que tenga una buena geminación, y semilla de frijol de buena calidad, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y ertilidad del suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is 38 years old, he is married, and he lives with his wife and children, who are his greatest priority. With the loan, he wants to purchase fertilizers and other products needed for planting, and that way have a good germination, and good quality bean seeds. He also wants to pay for labor to apply these products, and to aid in the harvest once it has developed, so that he can do a good job. 

He is planning to take advantage of the good climate conditions and the soil fertility in the area for this crop. He also wants to put into practice the experience of several years working with dry grains. Aside from being able to purchase the best products, and of the best quality, so that his crop will have a good and healthy development, and having a good yield, he wants to have a short-term significant production. 

With the profits from the expected harvest, he wants to invest in the goodwill and education of his family, and to meet some of the family's goals, and to keep investing in the crops. 

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He hadn't had other previous loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has easily provided him the loan with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant beans

loans.name: Mariana Del Carmen

texts.es: Mariana es una joven de 28 años de edad, es madre soltera y sus 2 hijos tiene 10 y 14 años y asisten a la escuela, Mariana  se dedica a la crianza de terneros, comenta que arrienda la hierba para tener su ganado, Mariana también se dedica a trabajar al jornal, el credito lo necesita para comprar terneros y asi mejorar su negocio, la aspiración de Mariana es seguir trabajando con nuestra institución y por medio de los créditos lograr tener los ingresos suficientes para que sus hijos sigan a delante en sus estudios.
texts.en: 28-year-old Mariana is a single mother. Her two children are 10 and 14 years old and both go to school. Mariana breeds calves and says that she rents the land on which she keeps her cattle. She also does daily-paid work. She needs the loan to buy calves which will enable her to improve her business. Mariana's ambition is to carry on working with our institution and, thanks to the loans, earn enough to enable her children to continue their education.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Malibi Vihira-Sagnarigu Kukou Group

texts.en:
Zenabu is a 45-year-old hardworking woman from Sagnarigu-Kukoo in the Northern region of Ghana. She is married and has six children. Zenabu is the individual pictured with her hand raised among members squatting.

Zenabu is a member of a parboiled rice processing group that has been in business for the last 30 years. The name of the group is ‘Suglo N Bori Buni Sagnarigu Kukuo’. She earns a good profit from the business simply because of the long standing experience she gained from the group in processing high quality parboiled rice for the Ghanaian local markets.

Zenabu and ‘Suglo N Bori Buni Sagnarigu Kukuo’ group have asked for a loan of GHS 10,400. Zenabu’s share of the loan is GHS 700 which would be used to buy paddy rice from rice farmers for processing. She aspires to produce in large quantities in the future and earn more income as well as to repay this loan and support her family by paying her children’s school fees.

Zenabu thanks Kiva lenders very much for their continuous support.

loans.use: To buy paddy rice from rice farmers for processing.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Doña Tomasa tiene 38 años de edad, estudió hasta el tercer grado y por la falta de recursos económicos no pudo continuar. Ella está casada su esposo trabaja como agricultor y de ser matrimonio y hogar procrearon nueve hijos, cuatro en la escuela estudian en diferentes grados en la primaria,  dos son empleados asalariados y tres colaboran en la casa y en el campo ellos cursaron únicamente la primaria de forma completa viviendo todos en casa. Doña Tomasa se dedica a la agricultura desde hace ya varios años su padre fue el encargado de transmitirle los conocimientos y le enseño a trabajar la tierra como única opción porque no pudo apoyarle en sus estudios aprendiendo muy bien el manejo de estas actividades las cuales son las que durante todo el año le permiten tener los granos básicos para el consumo y hasta para vender. El lugar donde trabaja está a treinta minutos aproximadamente y se traslada caminando. Ella solicita préstamo el cual utilizará para comprar fertilizantes, abonos, foliares y otras fórmulas ademas el pago de mano de obra que le permitirán dar el cuidado y mantenimiento que su plantación de café requiere para brindar una magnifica cosecha y esta poder venderla para generar ingresos económicos que mejoren la economía en su hogar. El sueño de Doña Tomasa es ayudar a sus hijos para que ellos puedan estudiar y ser personas con conocimiento y muy bien preparados, fortalecer el patrimonio por si ellos deciden dedicarse al trabajo de campo en su tiempo completo y que sean mejores personas en la vida.
texts.en:
Tomasa, 38, studied up until the third grade. Due to a lack of financial resources, she was unable to continue. She is married and her husband works as a farmer. They had nine children, four of whom are studying in various grades of primary school. Two of their children are salaried employees and three help in the household and on the farm. They only completed primary school and all live at home. 

Tomasa has worked in agriculture for many years. Her father was responsible for giving her his knowledge, and he taught her to work on the land as the only option since he could not support her with her studies. She learned to manage these activities very well, which allow her to have basic grains all year for consumption and also to sell. The place where she works is about thirty minutes away and she walks there. 

She is applying for a loan to pay workers, buy fertilizer, manure, plant fertilizers, and other products which she needs to care for and maintain her coffee crops in order to have a wonderful harvest. She hopes to sell the harvest to generate a financial income and improve her household finances. Tomasa's dream is to help her children so that they can study and be well-prepared people with knowledge, strengthen the patrimony in case they decide to work in the field full-time, and be good people in life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay workers to help with her coffee crops.

loans.name: Darlis Patricia

texts.es:
Darlis de 22 años de edad, pudo estudiar hasta 9° grado, está soltera y no tiene hijos, ella vive con su hermano y un tío y por el momento nadie depende de ella.

Actualmente, Darlis se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos al por menor, además en ocasiones trabaja en oficios domésticos en casas particulares.

Ella necesita muchísimo de este crédito para comprar golosinas, gaseosas, dulces, pan, entre otros productos, para el cafetín que cuidará en la escuela de su comunidad. 

Ella sueña con incrementar su negocio de crianza de cerdos pero también quiere mantener el chalet para mejorar su calidad de vida y así superarse.
texts.en:
Darlis, 22, was able to study until the 9th grade. She is single and does not have children. She lives with her brother and an uncle. At the moment, no one depends on her. 

Darlis makes a living raising and selling pigs by retail. She also works in various domestic tasks in private houses. She needs this loan very much in order to buy candy, bread, soda, etc. for the cottage at her community school for which she is responsible. 

She dreams of expanding her business raising pigs, but she also wants to keep the cottage to improve her quality of life and better herself.

loans.use: to buy products for the cottage at her community school for which she is responsible.

loans.name: Eustaquio

texts.es:
Eustaquio de 57 años de edad, es un señor muy trabajador y luchador ya que desde pequeño se dedicó a la agricultura y la siembra de hortalizas, pero actualmente trabaja en una alcaldia, su esposa se dedica a la venta de pupusas y otros productos comestibles, sus hijas son quienes se involucran en el trabajo y le ayudan a su madre en la venta.

Eustaquio lleva trabajando en la agricultura prácticamente desde muy joven, actualmente él paga mozos para la siembra debido a que no le queda tiempo porque se desempeña como ordenanza en la alcaldía de la comunidad, de modo que tiene ambos medios como fuentes de ingresos para el hogar.


El crédito lo necesita para cubrir el gasto de la post-cosecha en la cual él invertirá parte del dinero y el resto lo invertirá en la siembra de tomates.
 
Él sueña con seguir luchando por sus sueños a través de estos créditos.
texts.en:
Eustaquio, 57, is a very hardworking and persevering man.  He has worked in agriculture and growing vegetables from a very young age, but currently he works in the town hall.  His wife sells pupusas [stuffed tortillas] and other food products.  His daughters are involved in the work and they help their mother with the sales.

Eustaquio has been working in agriculture practically since he was very young.  Currently he pays workers to plant.  He doesn't have enough time because he's an office worker in the town hall.  That way he has both sources of income for his household.

He needs the loan to cover post-harvest expenses.  He's going to invest part of the money in that and the rest in planting tomatoes.

He dreams of continuing to strive for his dreams through these loans.

loans.use: to cover post-harvest expenses and to invest in planting tomatoes

loans.name: Maria Hilda

texts.es: Maria de 63 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica desde hace 6 años a la venta de ropa de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: María, 63, lives in her own house with her family.  She has been selling clothing on foot throughout various markets, and with what she earns from her sales, she manages to make progress.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more wholesale clothing so that she can continue with her sales, and thus have better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase more wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase more wholesale natural medicine

loans.name: Rosa Armides

texts.es: Rosa de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa para damas y caballeros desde hace 10 años, su negocio está ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada por esa razón posee muchos clientes, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para seguir con sus ventas y asi poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa, 43 years old, lives in her own house with her two children. She has made a living selling clothing for women and men for the past 10 years. 

Her business is located near her house in a heavily trafficked area. For this reason she has a lot of clients. With the profits she obtains she is able to get ahead. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more wholesale clothing in order to continue with her sales and in that way be able to have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more wholesale clothing

loans.name: Esmeralda Elizabeth

texts.es: Esmeralda de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee desde hace 7 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. ya que le ha ido muy bien en sus ventas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Esmeralda, 33 years old, lives in her own home with her husband. For the past 7 years, she has owned a small store located in her place of residence. She has a lot of clients because of her good prices and the courtesy she shows when selling. With her profits, she is able to move forward. 

She is asking for a loan again in order to be able to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet bread, etc. since their sales have gone well and in this way she will be able to have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in a 10-cubic-meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Juan Ernesto

texts.es: Juan de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su nieta, el se dedica desde hace 27 años a la venta de cinchos pro mayor en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa y ya tiene muchos clientes establecidos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas cinchos por mayor y así continuar con su trabajo para tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
59-year old Juan lives in his own house with his wife and granddaughter. For 27 years he has been selling belts in the different markets near his home. He has an established customer base. With the money he earns from sales he manages to pay for household expenses.

Juan is seeking a loan to buy more belts at wholesale prices. Then he will be able to earn more money and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: buy belts at wholesale prices

loans.name: Armando

texts.en:
Armando owns 16 cows, which produce the milk he sells for a living. 

He has been looking for opportunities to expand his milk production by acquiring more cows, but his daily expenses in LP gas and chemical fertilizer were not allowing him to save enough money for the expansion of his activity. As he invests in his Sistema Biobolsa biodigester, he will be able to produce his own biogas and biofertilizer, by transforming his cows' manure into these precious resources. 

He will progressively displace the expensive external inputs he used to purchase, therefore reducing his expenses and improving his carbon footprint, as he will treat his cows' waste, cook and heat water with renewable energy, and increase the yield of his corn field in a natural way, by applying the nutrient-rich organic fertilizer on the plants. 

As he saves the money he used to spend on unsustainable external resources, he will be able to progressively expand his farm and milk production capacity.

This loan represents 20% of the total cost of the biodigester, the remaining part being covered by a government subsidy.

loans.use: to purchase a 10-cubic-meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to acquire a 10-cubic-meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Dédé Mawussé

texts.fr: Dédé, mariée et mère de quatre enfants est née à Lomé le 28/04/1986 ; elle habite  à Adakpamé avec sa famille et vend des friperies en se promenant de quartier en quartier puis fait une marge bénéficiaire assez considérable ; elle s’approvisionne au marché de Hédzranawoé une fois par mois. Dédé désire ce microcrédit pour développer son activité qui lui est profitable en vue de soutenir les besoins de son foyer et améliorer sa vie quotidienne.
texts.en: Dédé, a married mother of four, was born in Lomé on 4/28/86. She lives in Adakpamé with her family and sells used clothing while walking from neighborhood to neighborhood and makes a rather considerable profit. She stocks up at the market in Hédzranawoé once a month. Dédé would like this microloan to develop her business, which is profitable for her, in order to support the needs of her household and to improve her daily life.

loans.use: to buy 60 skirts, 60 pairs of pants, and 75 pairs of shorts

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es:
José Francisco está decidido en convertirse en un profesional exitoso, a sus 24 años de edad lucha día a día para sacar adelante sus estudios y graduarse con honores de Ingeniería en Diseño y Construcción. Es un joven responsable, el cual ama su carrera y tiene claro sus objetivos. Cuando no está estudiando ayuda a su papá, el cual se dedica a ser obrero en construcción, así aprende más y le retribuye un poco el esfuerzo.
Este joven ejemplar solo cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres, los cuales hacen todo lo posible por hacer de él un hombre de bien. Sin embargo no han podido brindarle una computadora portátil para que él pueda hacer sus trabajos, es por eso que el deposita su esperanza en Kiva a través de MiCrédito para poder comprar una y con esto ponerse al día con los avanzados programas de ingeniería, optimizándole tiempo, mejorando su calidad de estudiante y desarrollándose de forma integral en esta sociedad globalizada.
texts.en:
José Francisco, aged 24, is determined to become a successful professional. He works hard every day to successfully complete his studies and graduate with honors in Design and Construction Engineering.

He is a responsible young man, who loves his career and has clear objectives. When he is not studying, he helps his father, who is a construction worker. In this way, he learns more and receives a small payment for his efforts.

This outstanding young man can only count on his parents' support. They have done everything in their power to raise him to be an upstanding man. However, they have been unable to buy him a laptop to do his assignments. For this reason, he is pinning all his hopes on Kiva through MiCrédito to be able to buy one. This purchase will allow him to catch up with the latest engineering software, optimize his time, improve the quality of his learning, and have an integral development in this globalized society.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blocks, iron, cement, sand, and gravel so that she can remodel and improve her home.

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es: Otilia de 63 años de edad es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, quien se dedica de lleno a su negocio, Otilia vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 35 años, ubicado en el mercado municipal  que está cerca de su lugar de residencia, ella solicita un préstamo para poder comprar más frutas y verduras por mayor, para tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Otilia, 63, is a very hardworking and responsible person who has devoted herself fully to her business.  Otilia lives with her family in her own house.  She has owned a fruit and vegetable stand in the market near her home for 35 years.  She is requesting a loan in order to purchase more wholesale fruits and vegetables so that she can have better earnings and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more wholesale fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Essi Natacha

texts.fr: Essi est une femme très dynamique mariée et âgée de 39 ans, vit ensemble avec ses deux enfants à Anfamé. Essi est commerçante de produits d‘alimentation générale qu’elle approvisionne au marché d’Akodessewa trois fois par mois et a une bonne rentabilité pour son activité. Pour réaliser une bonne marge de bénéfice en vue de concrétiser ses rêves, Essi désire ce prêt pour le bon développement de son activité.
texts.en: Essi is a very energetic 39-year-old married woman who lives with her two children in Anfamé. Essi sells general food products, which she stocks up on at the market in Akodessewa three times a month, and has a profitable business. In order to realize a good profit margin to make her dreams come true, Essi would like this loan to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy two cartons of Peak milk, two containers of OMO laundry detergent, and three cans of soda

loans.name: Kokoe

texts.fr: Kokoè est une femme mariée de 38 avec ses cinq enfants et vit à Aflao Sagbado. Kokoè gagne sa vie dans la vente des chaussures et des pains au grand marché de lomé et s’approvisionne trois fois par mois dans ce marché. Espérant réaliser beaucoup plus d’économies pour assurer un bon avenir à sa famille, Kokoè sollicite ce prêt pour financer son commerce.
texts.en: Kokoè is a 38-year-old married mother of five who lives in Aflao Sagbado. Kokoè earns a living by selling shoes and bread at the grand market in Lomé and stocks up three times a month at this market. In hoping to save more to ensure a good future for her family, Kokoè is seeking this loan to finance her business.

loans.use: to buy five pairs of adult shoes, five pairs of children's shoes, and five loaves of bread

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a 6 m3 Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Maria Candida

texts.es:
María, de 32 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado de educación básica, está casada, tiene 2 hijos.

La fuentes de ingresos que tiene María, provienen de un pequeño comedor que tiene en la colonia donde vive, vende comida de lunes a sábado, descansando unicamente el día domingo de cada semana.

El financiamiento que esta solicitando María, es para cambiar el piso y las paredes de su vivienda, porque se encuentran bien dañados, con ello quiere darle una mejor apariencia a su casa.

María, sueña con tener una casa bonita y que su comedor sea reconocido por más personas.
texts.en:
María is 32 years old and studied through the ninth grade of her basic education. She is married and has two children.

María generates income from a small diner that she established in the neighborhood where she lives. She sells food Monday through Saturday. The only time she can rest each week is on Sunday.

The loan María is requesting will be used to replace the floor and the walls of her home because they are severely damaged. With this loan, she wants to give her house a better appearance.

María dreams of having a beautiful house and that her diner will be known among many people.

loans.use: to replace the floor and the walls of her home.

loans.name: Ameyo E,

texts.fr: Etant une femme mariée et mère de trois enfants, Ameyo est née en 1963 à Lomé et vit au quartier Akodessewa. Avec son commerce d’ignames Ameyo achète deux fois par mois  ses tubercules au marché d’Akodessewa pour les revendre. Ayant la volonté d’étendre son commerce et de promouvoir l’éducation de ses enfants, Ameyo souhaite ce prêt pour atteindre ses objectifs.
texts.en: A married mother of three, Ameyo was born in 1963 in Lomé and lives in the Akodessewa neighborhood. For her yam business, Ameyo buys tubers twice a month at the market of Akodessewa in order to resell them. Having the desire to expand her business and to promote her children’s education, Ameyo wishes for this loan in order to reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy 5 piles of yams

loans.name: Blanca Elizabeth

texts.es: Blanca de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella posee un negocio de venta de comida ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ms materia prima como: carnes, pollos, verduras, frutas, refrescos, etc. todo por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi poder tener una mejor estabilidad económica junto con su familia.
texts.en: Blanca, 49 years old, lives in her own home with her husband and her daughter. She has a food selling business located in her place of residence. She has a lot of clients because of her good prices. With what she makes from her sales and the support of her husband, she is able to get ahead. She is requesting a loan to purchase more raw material such as: meat, chickens, vegetables, fruits, soft drinks, etc all wholesale in order to be able to continue her sales and in this way be able to have a better economic stability together with her family.

loans.use: to buy meat, chickens, vegetables, fruits, soft drinks, etc everything wholesale

loans.name: Flor Elena

texts.es: Flor tiene 42 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, Flor está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Flor is 42 years old and lives in her own home with her son. For the last 10 years, she has run a business selling tortillas from her home and she has many customers. The income she earns from this allows her to pay for her domestic expenses. Flor is applying for this loan so that she can buy maize at wholesale prices and lime, which will allow her to continue to make and sell her tortillas and, consequently, increase her income so that she can improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy maize at wholesale prices and lime

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer muy perseverante, ella tiene 55 años de edad, tiene 5 hijos ya todos mayores de edad,  esta bonita familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá. 
Juana con el fin de apoyar a su esposo, en cuanto a la generación de  su economía, ella desde hace 20 años se dedica a la compra y venta de zapatos, ella vende calzados para  damas, caballeros y niños, además cuenta con un línea de zapatos deportivos. Es una actividad que siempre le gusta hacer, por los años que lleva vendiendo y por su amabilidad ella es muy reconocida en el mercado donde vende. 
 Juana tiene un sinfín de clientes, que la buscan cada día, pues para satisfacer a toda la clientela ella quiere mantener siempre equipada su negocio, es por eso que ella solicita un prestamo para comprar más mercadería, lo que Juana necesita son cuatro mil quetzales. 
Juana además de la zapatería también vende frutas, pero esta actividad lo hace más en la época de manzanas y duraznos, con los ingresos que obtiene Juana ella complementa algunos gastos que genera su familia. El sueño de Juana es ver su zapatería cada día más grande y también quiere seguir apoyando a sus hijos y sus nietos en lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Juana is a determined woman. She is 55 years old and has 5 older children. This beautiful family lives in a community of Sololá. 

Juana, with the goal of supporting her husband, as far as the creation of her economy, she has made a living for 20 years buying and selling shoes. She sells shoes for women, men, and children. In addition, she has a line of athletic shoes. It is an activity that she always likes to do. Because of the years she has spent selling and because of her courtesy she is very well recognized in the market where she sells. 

Juana has an endless number of clients who look for her each day. So, in order to satisfy all of her clientele, she always wants to keep her business equipped. It is for this that she requests a loan to buy more merchandise. What Juana needs is 4,000 quetzals.

Juana also sells fruits from the shoe store, but this activity is done more during apple and peach season. With the income she makes, Juana supplements some of the expenses that her family generates. Juana's dream is to see her shoe store every day larger, and also she wants to continue supporting her children and grandchildren with what they need.

loans.use: to buy footwear merchandise

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo, tiene la edad  de 49 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y sus hijos los cuales su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de semilla de frijol, hacer una buena preparacion del terreno,fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y así que tenga una buena geminación con un tamaño uniforme y de buena calidad, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 49 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children, who are his highest priorities. With this loan he intends to purchase bean seeds, prepare the terrain, and purchase fertilizer and other products to apply during planting. By doing so, he can have good germination with uniform size and good quality. He will also pay for labor for the application of the products and assistance of the plantation once there is growth. Thus, he can ensure that the job is well done. 

He aims to take advantage of the good weather and soil conditions in this area and to implement several years of experience in the handling of basic grains. Additionally, he can buy the best, highest quality products for his plantation in order to have good growth and health, thus achieving an adequate harvest and significant production in the short term. He plans to use the income from the expected harvest for the well-being and studies of his family, meet some family goals, and continue to invest in more crops.

This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He does not have other previous loans through state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided this loan with ease and a low interest rate.

loans.use: to sow beans.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: Maria de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica desde hace 21 años a la venta de pescado de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, adicional a eso también vende fruta, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pescados por mayor y así poder tener mejores ingresos para darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is 47 years old and lives in her own home along with her family. For the past 21 years, she has been selling fish as a street vendor at different markets located near her home. She also sells fruit. With the income she earns, María is able to get ahead.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more fish in bulk. As a result, she will have more income and be able to provide a better quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to buy fish in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria de 36 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas y caballeros,  desde hace 2 años ejerce este oficio y cuenta con muchos clientes fijos con lo que puede mantener su negocio a flote, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella esta solicita un crédito para comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 36 years old, makes a living selling undergarments for women and men. She has practiced this trade for 2 years and she has many loyal clients who keep her business afloat. With the profits she makes from her sales, she is able to cover some home expenses. She lives with her life partner and her two children. 

She is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity of undergarments with different prices, styles and colors, and in this way get more clients and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of undergarments in different prices, styles, and colors

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un señor de 52 años, él es casado tiene 6 hijos, cuatro de ellos trabajan como tejedores y dos están estudiando todavía, esta familia vive en una comunidad de San Antonio Palopo.  

Juan es un hombre que le encanta trabajar y se siente dichoso por tener este tipo de trabajo, él es tejedor actividad que realiza desde su casa, pues años atrás era una actividad que generaba mucha ganancia porque no había mucha competencia,  eran pocos los tejedores, pero con el pasar de los años ahora hay mucha gente que se dedica a al elaboración de tejidos típicos.  Pero una de las ventajas que tiene Juan es por los años de experiencia y por la calidad de su trabajo que realiza, siempre tiene demandas,  entonces Juan para atender a su clientela necesita de tener suficiente materia prima y para Juan la solución es buscar un prestamo para lograr comprar suficiente hilo para elaborar principalmente chalinas y entre otros productos. 

Juan para generar un poco más de economía también se dedica a la compra y venta de verduras, con estos dos ingresos Juan ha logrado alcanzar otras metas para progresar con su familia. Juan tiene esperanzas de conseguir su prestamo y la aspiración de este padre de familia es que con las ganancias pueda comprar lotes de terrenos para donarles a sus hijos cuando ellos estén grandes.
texts.en:
Juan is a 52 year old man. He is married and has 6 children, four of whom work as weavers and two of whom are still in school. The family lives in the community of San Antonio Palopo. Juan loves to work and is happy to have this type of job. He is a weaver and works in his home. Years ago, this business earned him a lot of money because there was not much competition and there were few other weavers. However, as time has passed, many people now weave traditional fabrics. 

Some of the advantages that Juan has are his years of experience and the quality of his work. There is always a demand for his work, so Juan, in order to attend to his customers' demand, needs to have enough raw materials. Juan's solution is to find a loan to purchase enough thread to make shawls and other products.

In order to earn a little more money, Juan also buys and sells vegetables. With the income from his two jobs, Juan has been able to meet goals to progress with his family. 

Juan hopes to receive his loan. This father's goal is to purchase lots of land with his earnings so that he can gift them to his children when they are older.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials (thread).

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es: Carlos es un emprendedor hombre de 30 años de edad, quien por muchos años laboró como asesor comercial y que gracias a su experiencia decidió con sus propios ahorros iniciar su negocio de comercialización de frutas y verduras para incrementar sus ingresos, puesto que en su anterior trabajo su salario no era suficiente para el sustento de su familia.   En la actualidad él ofrece frutas como mango, banano, naranjas, mandarinas, pomelos y verduras como apio, cebollín, pimentón, entre otras variedades a tiendas en diferentes barrios del municipio de Barranquilla, a quienes les brinda facilidad de pago. Alterno a esta actividad él atiende una venta de jugos naturales, empandas, deditos y papas rellenas, productos representativos de la región Caribe y que le encanta degustar a los transeúntes del sector.  En la actualidad Carlos tiene 13 años de experiencia con excelentes resultados, los cuales ha logrado conseguir por su esfuerzo y compromiso. Sus compras las realiza de contado por ello está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en la compra de frutas y verduras al por mayor; fresas, mango, mora, tomate de árbol, rábanos, pimentones y demás variedades.  Carlos es padre de dos hijos de 8 y 10 años de edad, a quienes desea ofrecerles una casa propia y un gran bienestar.
texts.en:
Carlos is an enterprising 30 year old man, who worked as a business consultant for many years and thanks to his experience, he decided to use his savings to start his own fruit and vegetable business to increase his income, since his previous job’s salary was not enough to support his family.

Today, he sells fruit such as mangoes, bananas, oranges, mandarins, pomelos, etc. and vegetables such as celery, chives, paprika, among other varieties, to stores in different neighborhoods in the city of Barranquilla, to whom he offers easy credit options.

Alternate to this activity, he tends to a small shop selling natural juices, stuffed breads, cheese sticks and stuffed potatoes, products representative of the Caribbean region, and loved by the area’s passersby.

Presently, Carlos has 13 years of experience with excellent results, which he has achieved with hard work and commitment. His purchases are made in cash and that’s the reason he’s requesting his first loan through Credikiva with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which he will invest in purchasing wholesale fruits and vegetables like strawberries, mangoes, berries, tree tomatoes, radishes, paprika and other varieties.

Carlos is the father of two children, of 8 and 10 years of age, to whom he wishes to offer their own home and great prosperity.

loans.use: purchase wholesale fruits and vegetables such as strawberries, mangoes, berries, tree tomatoes, radishes, paprika.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is an individual client aged 32 years, and he resides at Luvumbula village, Kiringente sub-county. He is married with three children aged three, six and eight. 

Francis is a farmer, growing mainly maize that he sells to earn income to improve on his standards of living. His challenge is inadequate capital to fund his project. 

Francis is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 UGX. He will use the loan to buy improved seeds and fertilizer to be able to harvest in abundant volumes. This will increase his income. He is thankful for the financial boost.

loans.use: To buy high-quality seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Francisco Humberto

texts.es: Francisco tiene 42 años de edad y vive con su grupo familiar, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene 8 años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, ya tiene mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hierro, metal, herramienta etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Francisco is 42 years old, and he lives with his family.  He owns a metal shop where he makes doors, balconies, and grilles, among other items.  He has been in this business for 8 years, and he has a lot of experience which helps him to improve his work each day. He now has many customers, as they seek him out for the quality of his work, the affordable prices, and above all, because he works to please his customers. He is requesting a loan from Integral, which will allow him to purchase iron, metal, tools, etc., and thus have better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase iron, metal, tools, etc.

loans.name: Jack's Group

texts.en:
Jack  is 52 years old and has 7 children. He is a group leader and is representing his group, which is comprised of 9 farmers in the district of Kakamega North, in Kenya. 

Jack has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of his desire to earn enough to feed his family, and, although he described his last harvest as very good, he believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. Jack also decided to purchase a solar light as part of his loan, which he is very excited about, as it will allow him to have an overall improved quality of life.

Obtaining this loan means that Jack's Group will be able to receive a total of 7 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 4.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Ruth's Group

texts.en:
Ruth, pictured above, is a group leader and is representing her group, formed of seven farmers in Kakamega South District, Kenya. She joined One Acre Fund for the first time in 2011 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to spread the story of One Acre Fund farmers. She is married and has four children.

With a portion of this loan, Ruth will not only purchase maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, but also a solar light. Receiving a solar light as part of her loan means that now she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. Ruth plans to use the profits she gains this year to send her children to school.

In total Ruth’s Group will use the inputs received from this loan to plant a total of 7.25 acres of land. They will also receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Diana's Group

texts.en:
Diana is forty years old and often described as a very hardworking individual. She has three children and is married. As a group leader, Diana is representing her group of ten farmers in Kakamega North District in Kenya, and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Diana's desire to earn enough to feed her family. Apart from receiving farming inputs, she is also purchasing a solar light as part of her loan, which is very exciting to her as she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits that she gains from this year’s harvest, she plans to save more money for the future.

Diana and her group will receive a total of 6 solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Rael's Group

texts.en:
Rael, pictured above, has ten children and is always described as a very friendly person, which is why she was selected to become the group leader of her group. Rael is representing her group of nine farmers in Kakamega North District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Rael has been a farmer for more than thirty years and, in order to earn enough to feed her family, she decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. Her loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which she is very happy to be getting as that means she will now reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this coming season, Rael is planning to buy a cow.

A total of 5 acres will be planted by Rael's Group, and between them they will receive a total of seven solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Maxwell's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Maxwell, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. He is twenty-nine years old and, as a group leader, he is representing his group of fourteen farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. He is married and has two children.

Maxwell is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund as this helps him to earn enough to feed his family. Maxwell says that he is happy to have made that decision because, since he first joined in 2012, he has been able to consistently feed his family, which has improved his day-to-day life significantly. Maxwell will use the profits from this season to save more money for the future.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.25 acres. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of eleven solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Kholdona

texts.ru: Холдона 59 летняя женщина. Она проживает в районе Шахритус вместе семьей. У нее большая и дружная семья.  Холдона замужем, у нее четыре сына и две дочери. Сыновья женаты, старший сын живет отдельно. Дочери замужем.  Ее муж занимается земледелием. Холдона занимается продажей одежды на местном рынке. Она продает женскую и детскую одежду. Ей в работе помогают сыновья и невестки. Холдона и муж стараются обеспечить своим детям все условия жизни. Холдона имеет коровник и запас корма для скота. Холдона планирует начать новый бизнес, покупать несколько крупнорогатого скота и откармливать их в течение несколько месяцев, потом перепродавать их на местном рынке. Для нового бизнеса Холдона берет кредит, чтобы быстрее начать животноводство. В будущем Холдона планирует улучшить условия жизни семьи и расширить животноводство. Это кредит поможет ей начать новый бизнес. Холдона верит в Вас и надеется на Вашу помощь. Поддержите ей с финансовой трудности.
texts.en:
Kholdona is a 59 year old woman. She lives in the Shahrituz District with her family. She has a large and close-knit family. Kholdona is married and has four sons and two daughters. Her sons are married and her eldest son lives on his own. Her daughters are married. Her husband practices crop farming. Kholdona sells clothing at the local market. Her sons and daughters-in-law help her with her work. Kholdona and her husband strive to do all that they can to provide their children with good living conditions.

Kholdona has a cowshed and a stockpile of cattle feed. Kholdona plans to start a new business - she will buy several cattle, fatten them up over the course of several months, and then resell them at the local market. Kholdona is taking out a loan for her new business so that she can start livestock rearing sooner. In the future, Kholdona plans to improve her family's living conditions and expand her livestock rearing business. This loan will help her start her new business. Kholdona believes in you and relies on your help. Please support her through her financial difficulties.

loans.use: to buy cattle and start her new business.

loans.name: Alvaro Andres

texts.es:
Alvaro es un hombre joven de 19 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos y estudia la carrera de ingeniería comercial.
Él es inteligente, responsable, sociable, emprendedor y trabajador. Sus estudios los desarrolla en la universidad tecnológica boliviana ubicada en la zona central; un área caracterizada por el comercio en todas las áreas, y que alberga a universidades, oficinas públicas y empresas privadas que conviven lado a lado, de clima seco y frío durante todo el año, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 8-18 grados centígrados.
Alvaro es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por los estudios que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus padres que viven en alquiler en una casa construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Sus estudios los realiza en la universidad, en la carrera de ingeniería comercial. “trabajo como auxiliar administrativo en la fundación Afrobo que se dedica a ayudar a los niños afrobolivianos y estudio la carrera de ingeniería comercial…” comenta. Su sueño es ser profesional y trabajar en la misma fundación Afrobo y así ayudar a niños afrobolivianos, él desea realizar el pago de la universidad por adelantado para finalizar su carrera profesional. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que trabaja y estudia. 
Es por esos motivos que Alvaro solicita un préstamo para inscribirse y pagar por adelantado las materias de la universidad.
texts.en:
Alvaro is a young, single man with no children. He is 19 years old and is intelligent, responsible, sociable, entrepreneurial and hard-working. He is studying on a commercial engineering course at the Bolivian University of Technology located in the city's central business area, an area which is home to universities, public offices and private companies co-existing side by side. The area has a cold, dry climate all year round, with a daytime temperature range between 8 and 18 degrees centigrade.

Alvaro says, "I work as an administrator for the Afrobo foundation which aims to help Afrobolivian children and I'm also studying at the University."

Alvaro is of a dark complexion and short stature, with short dark hair. His mother tongue is Aymará which he speaks at home with his family, whereas he speaks Spanish for the purposes of his course. He lives with his family who rent a brick built house with a corrugated roof, drinking water supply, electricity and a sewage system. His dream is to become a professional individual and to continue working for the Afrobo foundation and helping the children. Alvaro is applying for this loan so that he can re-enroll at the University and pay his course fees in advance, allowing him to complete his studies. This is his first loan cycle with the institution in the one year that he has been working and studying.

loans.use: to re-enroll in the university and to pay his course fees in advance.

loans.name: Daniel's Group

texts.en:
Daniel has been a farmer for more than 30 years. Although he is pictured alone, he is actually representing his group of 12 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. Daniel is described as a very reliable person, which is largely why he was selected to be the group leader.

Daniel started working with One Acre Fund in 2014 and decided to get farming supplies and a solar light as part of his loan. He is very excited about this new addition, as he will be able to have light during dark hours and his children will be able to study. He can’t wait to send his children to school using the profits he earns from this coming season. 

Daniel's Group will be able to plant a total of 6.25 acres using the farming inputs obtained with this loan, and will also receive a total of 11 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, hybrid seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Mariama's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe crée depuis Avril 2014,est constitué de 19 membres qui habitent tous dans la même localité. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Mamadou Ciré,âgée de 37 ans,se trouvant debout a droite de la photo et levant le bras,est notre emprunteuse vedette. Elle est mariée et mère d'une fille. Elle effectue le commerce comme activité principale.

Avec son crédit, elle compte acheter des sacs d'arachide d'une valeur de 35000f,des légumes a hauteur de 10000f
et le reste pour les frais de transport.

Pour son bénéfice,elle compte s'entretenir et renforcer son épargne.
texts.en:
This group was created in April 2014 and is comprised of 19 members who live in the same town. Their main activity is business. 

Mamadou Ciré is 37 and is pictured standing at right with her hand raised. She is the star borrower. She is married and has one daughter. Her primary activity is business. 

With her loan, she will buy bags of peanuts for 35,000F, vegetables for 10,000F. She will also pay for her transportation costs. 

With her profits, she would like to maintain and bolster her savings.

loans.use: buy goods.

loans.name: Lonah's Group

texts.en:
Lonah is 47 years old and has 10 children. She is a group leader and representing her 12 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. 

Lonah has farmed with One Acre Fund for years, having joined the program for the first time in 2009. This decision was largely a result of her desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. She described her last harvest as very good and believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Lonah also decided to purchase two solar lights as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Lonah's Group will be able to receive a total of 10 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 7 acres.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Elida Judith

texts.es:
Elida Judith es una señorita de 19 años de edad ella por su amabilidad es destacada en su comunidad Elida vive en una comunidad de San Andrés Sementabaj junto a sus padres y hermanos. 
Elida es una mujer muy visionaria, con esta mentalidad  ha alcanzado varias metas en la vida,  pero ella no  quiere quedarse hasta ahí, si no lo que busca es progresar más, pues ella ahora se dedica al cultivo de arveja ya que para ella es una manera de generar su economía, para obtener buenas cosechas y para lograr ganancias ella debe de trabajar duro en su cultivo. 
Pues  Elida para este año quiere seguir estudiando, pero ella no cuenta con suficiente dinero para hacer, pues por lo mismo ella solicita un prestamo en ADICLA y con este dinero ella estaría pagando  inscripción, colegiatura y comprar útiles escolares y con las ganancias de la cosecha de arveja pagara el prestamo poco a poco. 
El sueño de Elida es cerrar su carrera universitaria y ayudar a sus hermanos para que sigan estudiando, Elida es una mujer muy perseverante y  ella está completamente segura de conseguir lo que anhela y hacer realidad sus sueños
texts.en:
Elida Judith is a 19-year-old woman, who is known in her community for her kindness. She lives in the San Andrés Sementabaj community with her parents and her siblings.

Elida is a visionary woman. By having this frame of mind, she has achieved several goals in her life; however, she doesn't want to stop there, but rather make more progress. 

Currently, she works growing peas—an occupation through which she generates her income. To obtain a good harvest and make good profits, she has to work hard on her crops.

Elida wants to continue with her studies this year. However, she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from ADICLA. With this money, she would pay the registration and tuition fees and buy her school supplies. She will use the profits from her pea harvest to pay off the loan little by little.

Elida's dream is to finish her university degree and help out her siblings, so they can continue with their studies. 

Elida is a very persevering woman, and she is absolutely certain that she will achieve her goals and make her dreams come true.

loans.use: to cover her education expenses.

loans.name: Association Paysanne Pour Le Developpement Agrico

texts.en: Calix is coordinating a rural organization in Marmont that works to enhance the agricultural sector. They produce different kinds of wine from tamarind, guava, corn, rice, orange, pineapple, and cherry. They also produce various liquors, and vegetables such as tomatoes, cabbages, and peppers.As a female leader, she puts into practice  her training in chemistry while helping the organization move forward in the processing activity. Other members are part of the committee board. Mikerlange on the right front, Anna in the second position from the right, Eusaïe in the third position with the cap, Ycleber in the fourth position, Aline in the fifth position from the right, and Roseline sixth from the right. This organization is seeking a loan from ZAFÈN to purchase raw materials to increase its production capacity.

loans.use: To purchase 12 boxes of bottles, 6 boxes of jars, 1 pack of corks, and raw materials increase production capacity.

borrowers.first_name: Association Paysanne Pour Le Developpement Agrico

loans.name: Los García Group

texts.es: Al grupo Los García lo integran tres socios laboriosos y con ganas de seguir superándose por tal motivo solicitan por décima sexta ocasión el financiamiento en ADIM para sus negocios, cada uno de los socios con negocios diferentes se unen con un solo objetivo como es la superación para ofrecer mejores condiciones de vida a sus familias. Este grupo está coordinado por Mayra una señora emprendedora de 31 años de edad, casada, se dedica a la comercialización de ropa nueva en su comunidad, este negocio lo impulsó hace ocho años con ayuda financiera de su esposo, y con los créditos obtenidos en ADIM ha logrado cubrir la demanda que tiene de estos productos lo que la ha motivado a seguir solicitando los financiamientos para la compra de camisetas blancas, camisas colegiales, blusas, talladores, licras, etc., lo que le permitirá seguir creciendo en el ámbito de los negocios y así poder aportar a los gastos familiares. El resto de los integrantes son los señores, Manuel de 52 años de edad propietario de una pulpería desde hace seis años, y Juan que tiene la edad de 36 años y se dedica a la elaboración de canastos desde hace doce años en su domicilio.
texts.en:
The "Los García" group is made up of 3 hardworking members who want to excel. For this reason they are requesting their 6 loan with ADIM for their businesses. Each one has their own business and they got together with the sole objective of improving to offer better living conditions for their families.

The group is coordinated by Mayra, an enterprising 31 year old, married woman. She works selling new clothing in her community. She started this business 8 years ago with the financial help of her husband and with the loans she got from ADIM. She has managed to fill the demand for these products. This has motivated her to continue requesting loans to buy t-shirts, school shirts, blouses, bras, Lycra clothing, etc. This will allow her to continue expanding in the business environment and support the family expenses.

The rest of the members are: Manuel who at 52 years of age is the owner of a small store which he has had for 6 years. Juan who is 36 years old and has made baskets for 12 years in his house.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Cristobal Armando

texts.es: Cristóbal de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su nieto, el se dedica a venta de dulces artesanales de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas dulces por mayor y así poder tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
55-year old Cristóbal lives in his own house with his grandson. He earns his living selling traditional candies in the various markets near his home. He has many customers. With the money he earns he manages to pay for household expenses.

Cristóbal is now seeking a loan to buy bulk candies. Then he will be able to earn more money and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy bulk candies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy jeans, sweaters, watches and sport shoes.

loans.name: Neydi Eriane

texts.es: NEYDI ERIANE: Es una joven amable de 23 años de edad, es madre soltera de un pequeño de cinco años edad. Trabaja como maestra de escuela primaria en un barrio de Bilwi.  Está solicitando su primer crédito para reparar su vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado. Ella  quiere reconstruirla con cemento y madera, tipo minifalda. El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar materiales de construcción y pago de mano de obra. Ella sueña con tener una casa de concreto que tenga mejores condiciones para su hijo y sobre todo mayor seguridad.
texts.en:
Neydi Eriane is a nice young woman, age 23. She is a single mother with a little 5-year-old boy, and she works as a primary school teacher in a neighborhood of Bilwi.  

She is requesting her first loan in order to repair her home, which is in poor condition. She wants to rebuild it with cement and wood, a cement base and wooden walls, and she will use the loan to purchase construction materials and to pay for labor.  

She dreams of having a concrete house so that her son may have better conditions, and above all, greater security.

loans.use: to repair her home, which is in poor condition.

loans.name: Eda Marina

texts.es:
Marina, de 52 años de edad, es madre de 1 hijo de 36 años de edad, es viuda y ahora su hijo es quien le ayuda económicamente.

Marina, tiene una tortilleria ubicada en las instalaciones de su casa, ademas de eso su hijo pertenece a la cooperativa de pescadores y ostreros de la comunidad, lo que les permite un ingreso más, en el sustento diario  de su hogar.

Marina, decidio solicitar un crédito para comprar maíz y leña para el negocio de las tortillas; ya que viene la época donde se pone más caro y ella quiere aprovechar a comprarlo ahora que está barato.

A futuro Marina, desea comenzar a vender otro tipo de alimentos como pupusas, enchiladas y pastelitos.
texts.en:
Marina, 52 years old, is the mother of one son who is 36 years old.  She is a widow, and now her son is the one who supports her economically.  

Marina has a tortilla making shop located in her house.  In addition to this, her son is part of a cooperative of fishermen and oyster-catchers in the community, which allows them more income in their household livelihood.  

Marina is requesting a loan to buy corn and firewood for the tortilla business.  As things are becoming more expense, she wants to take advantage and buy them now while they are cheap.

In the future, Marina wants to begin to sell other types of foods like pupusas, enchiladas, and cupcakes.

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Juana Evelia

texts.es:
La edad no es impedimento para acceder a la educación, Juana es ejemplo de esto, pues a sus 38 años cursa con mucho entusiasmo el último año de su carrera universitaria Contaduría Pública. Esta mujer dedicada y responsable aspira poder terminar su educación con honores y desarrollarse en cualquiera de las áreas que se adapten a su perfil profesional. 

Juana solicita el crédito para pagar los módulos de titulación de su carrera, pues sin estos le será imposible encontrar un empleo donde se valoren las capacidades y habilidades que ella posee. A la vez, podrá dedicarse a la profesión que ama, porque  en la actualidad se dedica a la consejería de belleza y no se siente completamente realizada.
texts.en:
Age is not an obstacle to access education. Juana is an example of this, because at 38 she is studying the last year of her university degree in Public Accounting with a lot of enthusiasm. This dedicated and responsible woman aspires to be able to finish her education with honors, and develop herself in any of the areas that fit her professional profile. 
Juana will ask for the credit to pay for the modules for the qualification of her degree, because without these it will be impossible to find a job where the skills and abilities she possesses will be valued. At the same time, she will be able to work in the profession that she loves, because currently she works in the beauty profession,  and does not feel completely fulfilled.

loans.use: to pay the modules for the qualification of her degree.

loans.name: Oscar Rene

texts.es:
Oscar, de 41 años de edad, es comerciante, estudió hasta noveno grado, esta divorciado desde hace 5 años, tiene cuatro hijos, dos no viven con él porque ya están acompañados, solo el ultimo de sus hijos depende economicamente de él.

Oscar, se ha dedicado al comercio desde hace mas de 20 años, anteriormente tenia un comedor, lo empezó a administrar con su hermana mayor; ahora él tiene un negocio de venta de hamburguesas y panes y tambien sale a vender estos productos en bicicleta por las tardes.
 
Oscar, solicita el crédito para comprar 8 tubos pvc, 15 bolsas de cemento y 12 laminas galvanizadas, para mejorar la apariencia de su local.

El sueño de Oscar, es ampliar su negocio y que sea competitivo y muy reconocido en su comunidad.- También, desea que su hijo logre sus metas y se convierta en un profesional.
texts.en:
Oscar is a 41-year old salesman who studied up to 9th grade. He got divorced 5 years ago and has 4 children, 2 of whom live independently with their partners. Only his youngest depends on him financially. 

Oscar has been a salesman for more than 20 years. He used to have a diner, which he ran with his older sister. He now has a business where he sells hamburgers and bread and in the afternoon he sells this products cycling.

Oscar is requesting a loan to buy 8 pvc pipes, 15 cement bags and 12 galvanized layers to make improvements to his store. His dream is to grow the business and to make it competitive and recognized in his community. He also wishes that his son will reach his goals and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy 8 pvc pipes, 15 cement bags and 12 galvanized layers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition and to buy school supplies for her daughter, who is going to start studying in the university.

loans.name: Mirian Yesenia

texts.es: Mirian de 24 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que se esfuerza por sacar adelante a su hija de 4 años de edad junto a su esposo con los que vive en casa propia desde hace muchos años. Ella se dedica a atender su negocio de venta de golosinas y platillos típicos en un centro educativo de la zona, por lo que sus ventas son muy buenas. Mirian desea terminar de construir su vivienda ya que no alcanzo a terminar el área de la cocina, por lo que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena y polines para terminar de construir el área de la cocina y poder disfrutar de un lugar adecuado en el cual pueda preparar sus alimentos y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Mirian is a 24-year old entrepreneur who fights to get ahead with her 4-year old daughter and husband, with whom she lives in their own house. She makes a living running a business where she sells candy and traditional dishes in a school, with very good results. 

Mirian is looking forward to finishing her house, as the kitchen is still incomplete. This is why she is requesting a loan to FUSAI. She will buy galvanized layers, cement, sand and wood lumbers to finish the kitchen and start enjoying a space to cook and providing her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy galvanized layers, cement, sand and wood lumbers to finish the kitchen area.

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es: Sandra desde niña sintió inclinación por la estética y gracias al apoyo de su esposo logró realizar estudios tecnológicos en éste arte, posteriormente adecuó su casa e inicio su salón de belleza en el cual lleva 6 años de funcionamiento. Ella tiene la oportunidad de ejercer la profesión que le gusta desde su casa, así mismo puede compartir con su hijo de 11 años y sus hijas de 11 y 4 años de edad. En sus salón de belleza, ofrece servicios de corte de cabello, cepillado, tintes, desrizado, iluminaciones y limpiezas faciales, sus principales clientes son sus amigos, familiares, vecinos y referidos a quienes ofrece sus servicios todos los días en el horario de 8 a.m. a 8 p.m. en la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en la compra de una vitrina y productos capilares necesarios para la prestación de sus servicios, como masajes, shampoo, tintes, keratinas y demás. Esta inversión es muy significativa para mejorar el servicio puesto que el cliente tendrá la oportunidad de escoger tratamientos de acuerdo a sus necesidades.  Sandra desea a largo plazo ampliar su negocio para tener más capacidad, oportunidad y agilidad en el servicio, así mismo continuar trabajando para ayudar en la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Since she was a child, Sandra felt a calling for cosmetology, and thanks to the support of her husband, she managed to complete technological studies in this art. Afterwards, she made her house suitable and started the beauty salon which has been operating for 6 years. 
She has the opportunity to work in the profession that she likes in her home. In this way, she can be with her son of 11 years and her daughters of 11 and 4 years. In her beauty salon, she offers haircut services, brushing, dyes, straightening, highlights, and facial cleansings. Her main clients are her friends, family members, neighbors, and referrals, to whom she offers her services every day in the hours of 8 a.m. until 8 p.m. Currently she is applying for her first Kiva loan through the Foundation Mario Santo Domingo, which she will invest in the purchase of a display cabinet, and necessary hair products to offer her services, such as massages, shampoos, dyes, keratins, and others. This investment is very meaningful to improve the service, because the clients will have the opportunity to choose treatments according to their needs. 
In the long term, Sandra wants to expand her business to have larger capacity, opportunity, and agility in the service, and be able to continue work to help in the education of her children.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a display cabinet, and necessary hair products to offer her services, such as massages, shampoos, dyes, keratins, and others.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 30 años de edad tiene un negocio de venta de hot dogs desde hace 3 años tiene muy buena clientela pues vende su comida a un buen precio su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ganancias que obtiene cubre algunos gastos de su hogar, Miguel  solicita un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario para elaborar sus alimentos como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, salchichas entre otros ingredientes y poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en su casa con los gastos que se le puedan presentar.
texts.en:
Miguel is 30 years old and has had a business selling hot dogs for 3 years. He has very good clients, since he sells his food at a good price. His business is located in his home, and he has many clients. With the earnings from this business, he covers some of the household expenses. 

Miguel requests a loan that will allow him to buy all that he needs to make his food, including bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, mortadella, and sausages, among other ingredients. This will enable him to have better earnings and continue helping his household with the expenses that come up.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, mortadella, and sausages, among other ingredients.

loans.name: Judith's Group

texts.en:
Judith is 56 years old and has 5 children. She has been a farmer for 20 years and is very experienced. She is represents a group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya.
