Этой деятельности ей нравится ежедневный доход. Махбубаи старается принимать больше заказы на шитье женской одежды и  зарабатывать больше, чтобы помочь родителям обеспечить хорошие условия жизни. Она планирует купить холодильник и стиральную машину. Из-за нехватки денежных средств Махбубаи обратилась за кредитом. Махбубаи верит в Вас. Вы можете поддержать ее сейчас. Махбубаи ждет Вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mahbubai is a young resident of the city of Dushanbe. She is 22 years old and not married. Mahbubai is a good, responsible and active girl. She lives with her mother and her father. 

Mahbubai works from home with sewing national women's clothing on order. Her mother helps her with the work. Mahbubai started to sew women's clothing in 2012. She enjoys a daily income from this business. 

Mahbubai strives to take more orders for sewing women's clothing and earn more money, in order to help her parents provide good living conditions. She plans to purchase a refrigerator and a washing machine. Because she does not have enough money she applied for a loan. Mahbubai trusts in you. You can help her now. Mahbubai awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator and a washing machine

loans.name: Nannete

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Nannete works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Nannete is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Nannete has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Rhoan

texts.en:
Rhoan is 30 years old and married. She has three children, two of whom are currently in school.

Rhoan is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs. She has been in pig fattening for 10 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rhoan would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Fariza

texts.ru:
Фариза 24 летняя жительница района Рудаки. Она замужем и имеет одного ребенка. У нее маленький сыночек. Ее муж предоставляет услуги таксиста. Фариза добрая и шустрая женщина.   Фариза дома ведет домашнее хозяйство и параллельно занимается  шитьем женской одежды. Она занята этой деятельностью уже более 5 лет. Ей нравится своя работа и ежедневный доход. 
У Фаризе есть не достроенный дом, и Фариза хочет завершить ремонт, поэтому она берет кредит, купить строительные материалы: алебастр, цемент, краски, обои  и  люстры. Кредит, который она запрашивает, поможет ей улучшить условия жизни семьи.  В будущем она планирует расширить деятельность. Фариза верит  Вас и надеется на Вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Fariza is 24 years old and she lives in the Rudaki district of Tajikistan.  She is married and the mother of a little boy.  Her husband provides taxi services.  Fariza is a kind and smart woman.  She takes care of the household and also sews women's clothes.  She has been involved in this activity for more than five years already.  She enjoys her work and the income that she makes every day.

Fariza's house is not finished, and she would like to finish building it.  For this reason, she is taking a loan to buy materials such as plaster, cement, paint, wallpaper and chandeliers.  The loan that she is requesting will help her to improve her family's living conditions.  In the future, she is planning to expand her activity.  Fariza is confident that she will receive your help and she is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to finish building her house.

loans.name: Angélica María

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Santa Mónica se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año, por su gastronomía y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Angélica, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 10 y 7 años que estudian en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una rectificadora.
Doña Angélica es una mujer muy buena y trabajadora que para ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar se dedica al comercio, ella vende ropa y zapatos de todo tipo y  su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sale en los momentos que esta mas desocupada aunque la mayor parte de sus ventas las realiza en su casa hasta donde llegan  sus clientes cuando necesitan algo, ella deja  sus productos a crédito  y cobra cada semana, lleva más de 6 años con esta actividad la cual le ha dado muy buenos beneficios.
Este crédito es para  comprar ropa y zapatos para sus ventas. Lleva 6 en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con la ayuda de su primer crédito empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
The communal bank Santa Mónica meets every 15 days in the city of Manta.  The city is known for its beautiful beaches, which are frequently visited all year long, its gastronomy, and for being a place of unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where Angélica, 32, lives.  She is married and has two children, ages 10 and 7, who attend school.  Her husband works for a grinding machine company.

Angélica is a very good, hard-working woman who helps her husband with the household expenses by working as a merchant.  She sells clothing and shoes of all kinds, on a door-to-door basis.  She goes out when she is least busy although most of her sales are conducted from home where customers visit when they need something.  She sells on a credit basis and collects payment every week.  For over six years she has been in business, earning a good profit.

This loan is to buy clothing and shoes to sell.  Angélica has been in the communal bank for six years and she like it because she was able to start her business with her first loan.  Her dream is to give her children the best she can.

loans.use: To buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Rina works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from meat vending. Rina is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food vending business. 

Rina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Virginia works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Virginia is borrowing PHP 19,500 through NWTF to purchase more utensils and kitchenware for her restaurant business.

Virginia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more utensils and kitchenware

loans.name: Phoebe

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Phoebe works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Phoebe is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell for her general store business.

Phoebe has been sustaining her business activities through her past 15 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to save enough money to expand her business and repair her house.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and keep her source of income.

loans.name: Ceciliac Asuncion

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Santa Mónica se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año, por su gastronomía y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Cecilia, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es taxista.
Doña Cecilia con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar se dedica al comercio, ella vende ropa por catalogo, joyas de plata o bisuterías, así como también productos Avon, Yanbal(artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, sale en sus ratos libres y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos,  ella deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Tiene más de 26 años que se dedica a esta actividad, ella también le da parte del crédito para arreglos del taxi de su marido.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar joyas, ropa, cremas, perfumes y ciertos repuestos que necesita el taxi. Esta desde el inicio en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir adelante y tener un taxi nuevo.
texts.en:
The communal bank, Santa Mónica, meets every 15 days in the city of Manta.  The city is known for its beautiful beaches, which are frequently visited all year long, its gastronomy, and for being a place of unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where Cecilia, 52, lives.  She is married and has two independent, adult children.  Her husband is a taxi driver.

In an effort to earn her own income and help her husband with the household expenses, Cecilia sells clothing by catalogue, silver jewelry and also Avon and Yanbal beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women's accessories.  She sells door-to-door in her free time and also works from home where she attends to her most well-known customers.  She sells on a credit basis and collects payment every 15 days.  For over 26 years she has been in business.  Part of the loan will go to her husband for taxi repairs.

This loan will be used to buy jewelry, clothing, creams, perfumes and spare parts for the taxi.  Cecilia has been in the communal bank since it began and she likes how helpful the loans are.  Her dream is to get ahead and buy a new taxi.

loans.use: To buy jewelry, clothing, creams, perfumes and auto spare parts.

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en:
Glenda is a 45-year-old, married woman with two children, one of whom is currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Glenda has a buy-and-sell cosmetics and herbal products business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 30,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stocks of cosmetics and herbal products to sell.

Glenda has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of cosmetics and herbal products to sell

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena tiene 36 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con sus 04 hijos en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se realizan en este distrito son la agricultura y la ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, golosinas, gaseosas, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Adicionalmente se dedica a la venta de animales de corral como patos, pavos, cuyes, entre otros. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, golosinas, para incrementar el stock de su negocio. Con esto Magdalena espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir aumentar sus ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Magdalena is 36 years old, she has a partner, and lives with her 4 children in the Pucará district, located in the province of Jaén, region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Perú. The main activities in this district are agriculture and livestock. 
Her occupation is the sale of groceries, such as rice, sugar, candy, sodas, among others. Her business is located in her home. She has more than 5 years of experience in the business, and has loyal clients who give her very good personal and professional references. Additionally, she works in the sale of animals, such as ducks, turkeys, guinea pigs, among others. The credit will be used to purchase a large quantity of products, such as rice, sugar, oil, candy, to increase the stock in her business. In this way, Magdalena hopes to offer a larger variety of products to her clients, which will allow her to increase her income, and therefore improve her quality of life and of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of products, such as rice, sugar, oil, candy, to increase the stock in her business.

loans.name: Jorge Ivan

texts.es:
Jorge Ivan tiene 28 años de edad, es soltero y sin carga familiar. Reside en casa de sus padres en la provincia de Morropón, ubicado en la región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, la población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería, comercio y transporte.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros con su mototaxi propia, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 2 años, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El crédito será para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Jorge Ivan espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que aumentará sus ingresos y por ende le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge Ivan is 28 years old, he is single, and has no family of his own. He lives with his parents in the province of  Morropón, located in the region of Piure, in the northern coast of  Perú. Life in the community is quiet, the population works mainly in agriculture, livestock, commerce, and transportation. 
His occupation is providing passenger transportation services with his own motortaxi. He has done this activity for more than 2 years. He has experience in the business and has good personal and professional references in the area. 
The loan will be used to make repairs and give maintenance to his vehicle, which is currently in bad shape. In this way, Jorge hopes to offer a better service to his clients, which will increase his income, and therefore will allow him to improve his quality of life and of his family.

loans.use: to make repairs and give maintenance to his vehicle, which is currently in bad shape.

loans.name: Jennifer Del Rocio

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Santa Mónica se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año, por su gastronomía y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Jennifer, tiene 29 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión  libre y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 11 y 5  años  que estudian en escuela. Su esposo es mecánico automotriz.
Doña Jennifer con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa, ropa interior leonisa,  zapatos por catalogo así como también productos Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, sale en sus ratos libres y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos,  ella deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días. Tiene más de 12 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, zapatos, cremas, perfumes y todo de lo que ella vende. Lleva 4 ciclos en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos compra al contado y gana más. Sus sueños es darles lo mejor a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
The “Santa Mónica” loan group meets every fortnight in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches that receive visitors throughout the year, for its food traditions, and for being a city of unbeatable beauty with many tourist attractions.

And it is here that 29-year-old Jennifer lives. She has a partner and two children, ages eleven and five years old, both of whom are in school. Jennifer’s husband is an auto-mechanic.

In order to earn a little money on her own and help her partner with household costs, Jennifer works selling clothes, underwear, shoes from catalogues and Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumers and women’s accessories). She sells door-to-door in her spare time and also from her house, where her best customers come to visit her. Jennifer sells on credit, collecting payments every week. Jennifer has been doing this work for more than twelve years.

Jennifer will use this loan to buy clothes, shoes, creams, perfumes and other items that she sells. Jennifer has been with the loan group for four loan cycles and likes it because she can use the loans to buy on credit and earn more money. Jennifer’s dream is to give her children the best lives she can.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, creams, perfumes and other items.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo de 67 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica desde hace 43 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, Lorenzo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Lorenzo, who is 67 years old, lives in his own home with his wife. For 43 years, he has worked in agriculture and maize cultivation, bean, and sorghum. When the crops are ready, he sells them in the adjoining villages, and already has many loyal clients. Lorenzo is asking for a loan to purchase seed, fertilizers, manure, pest control, herbicides, etc., and improve his plot of land, which is shown in the photograph, to be able to continue with his crops, as this is his only source of work, and be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to purchase seed, fertilizers, manure, pest control, herbicides, etc., and improve his plot of land.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is in agriculture and she is selling vegetables.  She also sells fried bananas, pound and diamond. She goes to buy vegetables in other places and after she buys them, she brings them to the market  to sell. 

She started selling vegetables in 2008 with her own working capital of $500. Now she is requesting a loan of $800 from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to improve her business. 

She will use this loan to buy more vegetables including flower papaya, papaya, sweet potato leaves, and other things including fried bananas, pound and diamond. 

She sells vegetables every day because she earns a good income from it. She is taking the loan from Tuba Rai Metin to increase her income and to improve her management.

loans.use: to buy flower papaya, papaya, sweet potato leaves, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Uulkan

texts.ru: Уулкан 51 год, не замужем, есть двое детей. Дети самостоятельные, взрослые. У Уулкан - высшее экономическое образование, у нее двадцатилетний стаж работы, сегодня Уулкан работает бухгалтером. Заработная плата Уулкан 16,200 сом (KGS) в месяц. Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома и пристройки к нему зала, так как на сегодняшний день дом состоит только из двух комнат. На полученные кредитные средства Уулкан купит цемент, краску, кирпичи, гипсокартон для утепления дома и другие строительные материалы. Свои доходы Уулкан планирует и дальше вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий и хочет накопить на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Uulkan is 51 years old, single, and the mother of two children.  Her children are now grown up and independent.  Uulkan is a college graduate with a degree in economics.  She has 20 years of experience in her field of work: accounting.  She makes a monthly income of 16,200 som (KGS).  She has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy building materials to renovate her house and to build a new room as an attachment because, at the moment, her house only comprises two rooms.  Uulkan will use her loan to buy cement, paint, bricks, gypsum board for thermal insulation, as well as other construction materials.  She is planning to use her earnings to further improve her living conditions.  She also wants to save some money toward her son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy gypsum plasterboard to insulate her house, and to purchase cement, paint, bricks and other materials to build an additional room as an attachment.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda works hard to support her family. Rosalinda is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Rosalinda requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Rosalinda has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Rosalinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Celestina

texts.es:
Celestina es una mujer de 44 años de edad, casada, tiene 2 hijos varones de 11 y 9 años de edad, y una hija mujer de 15 años de edad, y su negocio es la venta de comida.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, independiente, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la localidad de ‘Sacaba’ una comunidad campesina que agrupa a restaurantes que se especializan en comida tradicional y donde se elabora la ‘chicha’ (bebida fermentada de maíz), de clima cálido semi tropical.
Celestina es de tez morena, cabello largo trenzado, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general. Su vida la realiza con su esposo que se dedica al transporte y sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, el mayor trabaja y estudia, viven en una casa propia sin terminar de construir, hecha de ladrillo y cuenta con agua de pozo y electricidad. Su casa está compuesta por 2 cuartos, no tiene vidrios en las ventanas y la cocina, baño y lavandería no tiene agua. Su sueño es terminar de construir su casa, ella desea realizar la instalación de agua potable, en su cocina, baño y lavandería para proporcionar un futuro mejor a su familia. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 9 años que lleva construyendo su casa.
Es por esos motivos que Celestina solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable, en su cocina, baño y lavandería para proporcionar una vivienda segura a su familia.
texts.en:
Celestina is a 44 year-old-woman, married, she has 2 sons who are 11 and 9 years old, and a daughter who is 15 years old. Her business is the sale of food. She is a good mother, entrepreneurial, independent, responsible, and hard-working. She does her business in the municipality of ‘Sacaba,’ a rural community with a lot of restaurants that specialize in traditional food, and where chicha (a fermented maize drink) is elaborated. It has a warm, semi-tropical climate. 
Celestina is brown skinned, has long, braided black hair, low height; her mother tongue is Quechua, which is spoken in the area, and she speaks Spanish as general culture. She shares her life with her husband, who works in transport, and her children, who go to school. The older one works and studies. They live in their own home which is not yet finished. It is made of brick and has water from a well. Her home is made up of 2 rooms, it has no glass on the windows, and the kitchen, bathroom, and laundry room have no water. Her dream is to finish building her home. She wants to make an installation of potable water in her kitchen, bathroom, and laundry room to provide a better future for her family. 
In the 9 years that she has been building her home, this is the second sequence of loans with the institution. 
It is for these reasons that Celestina asks for a loan, for the installation of potable water in her kitchen, bathroom, and laundry room to provide safe housing for her family.

loans.use: to install potable water in her kitchen, bathroom, and laundry room to provide safe housing for her family.

loans.name: Melva Carmita

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Santa Mónica se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año, por su gastronomía y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Melva, tiene 54  años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tiene 5  hijos mayores de edad e independientes.
Doña Melva es una mujer muy buena y trabajadora que le ha tocado trabajar duro para salir adelante, ella  se dedica a la venta de ropa  y zapatos por catálogos, así como también productos Avon,  Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas) y productos naturales, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y en su casa si alguno de sus clientes necesita de algo de lo que ella vende, trabaja todos los días unas tres horas diarias, entrega sus productos a crédito  y cobra cada semana, lleva más de 9 años con esta actividad la cual le permite salir adelante ella sola.
Este crédito es para  comprar ropa, zapatos, cosméticos y todos los productos que vende. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le han dado los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir adelante y gozar de buena salud.
texts.en:
The “Santa Mónica” loan group meets every fortnight in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches that receive visitors throughout the year, for its food traditions, and for being a city of unbeatable beauty with many tourist attractions.

And it is here that 54-year-old Melva lives. She is separated and has five grown and independent children.

Melva is a good and hard-working woman. She has had to work a lot in order to move forward in life. Melva makes a living selling clothes and shoes from catalogues, as well as Avon and Yanbal (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women’s accessories) and natural products. She sells door-to-door and from home in case any customers need anything. Melva works every day for around three hours per day. She sells her products on credit and collects payment every week. Melva has been doing this work for nine years, allowing her to move forward in life.

Melva will use this loan to buy clothes, shoes, cosmetics, and other items to sell. Melva has been with the loan group since its creation but likes it because of the help through loans. Melva’s dreams are to continue moving forward and keep up her good health.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, cosmetics, and other items.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Rosalinda requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

Rosalinda has been in this business for 14 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Rosalinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Yulduzkhon

texts.ru: Юлдузхон 31 год, замужем, есть 4 детей школьного и дошкольного возраста. У Юлдузхон среднее образование, на протяжении 4 лет она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, Юлдузхон смогла развить свою деятельность до 2 коров. На участке мерою 1,0 Га она выращивает кукурузу. Вся деятельность приносит Юлдузхон около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Для содержания скота есть все условия. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Юлдузхон обратилась в Банк "Бай –Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого, домашнего молока. Доходы от кредита позволят Юлдузхон расширить ее бизнес и накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Yulduzkhon is 31 years old, married, and she has four children who are in elementary school or preschool.  Yulduzkhon has a secondary education, and she has been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture for four years.  Thanks to her very hard work, she has managed to expand her activity to the point where she now owns two cows.  She also grows corn on one hectare of land.  Her entire activity brings her a monthly income of about 10,000 som (KGS).  She has everything she needs to raise cattle.  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a dairy cow.  This purchase will allow her to produce and sell more organic milk.  The income from her loan will help Yulduzkhon to expand her business and to save some money to renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase one dairy cow in order to sell organic milk.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo es un hombre de 31 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de derecho en la universidad.
Él es inteligente, independiente, constante, responsable, sociable, emprendedor y trabajador. Sus estudios los desarrolla en la universidad tecnológica boliviana ubicada en la zona central; un área caracterizada por el comercio en todas las áreas, y que alberga a universidades, oficinas públicas y empresas privadas que conviven lado a lado, de clima seco y frío durante todo el año, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 8-18 grados centígrados.
Gustavo es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por los estudios que realiza. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que esta construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Sus estudios los realiza en la universidad, en la carrera de derecho. “estudio leyes en la universidad y trabajo independientemente comerciando madera del norte de la provincia, este trabajo me ayuda a pagar mis estudios…” comenta. Su sueño es trabajar en un bufet de abogados, él desea realizar la compra de una computadora portátil y pagar la matrícula y pensiones de la universidad por adelantado para finalizar su carrera profesional. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que trabaja y estudia. 
Es por esos motivos que Gustavo solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora portátil y pagar las materias de la universidad.
texts.en:
Gustavo is a 31-year-old man, single with no children, and he is studying law at university. He is intelligent, independent, persevering, responsible, sociable, enterprising and hard-working. 

He is studying in the Bolivian University of Technology located in the central zone - a part of the city that has all kinds of business activities, houses the universities, and where public office buildings and private companies co-exist side by side. The climate is dry and cold all year round, with a daytime temperature that varies between 8 and 18°C [46 and 64°F]. 

Gustavo is dark-skinned, has short black hair and is short in stature. His mother tongue is Aymará, which he speaks with his family, and he speaks Spanish for his studies. He lives his life in his parents' house that is brick-built with a corrugated iron roof and has a drinking water supply, electricity and a sewage system. 

He is doing a law course at the university. "I am studying law at university and I work independently selling wood in the north of the province, a job that helps me pay for my studies," he said. 

His dream is to work in a lawyer's office. He wishes to buy a laptop and pay the university enrollment and tuition fees in advance to be able to finish his professional degree course. This is his first loan cycle with the institution in the 5 years he has been working and studying. It is for these reasons that Gustavo is requesting a loan to buy a laptop and pay his university course fees.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer and pay for his  university course fees.

loans.name: Rodolfo Anselmo

texts.es: Rodolfo de 39 años de edad se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y hortalizas, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposa y su hijo en casa propia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Rodolfo is 39 years old, and he has worked for 20 years in agriculture. He sows maize and green vegetables. He sells his products in different markets that are located close to his house. He lives with his wife and his son in their own home. He is asking for a loan to purchase seed, fertilizers, manure, pest control, etc. to be able to continue with his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to purchase seed, fertilizers, manure, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for us to introduce you to one of our Ruma agents, Linda. Linda lives in a suburban area named Cibereum, located in Bogor, West Java. She lives there with her husband and her two daughters. She owns a stall where she sells daily consumer products, small snacks and mobile airtime credits, She also processes utility bill payment in her stalls. Linda’s husband works as a teacher. To help her husband improve their life, she decided to join Ruma four months ago. She feels happy because ever since she joined Ruma, she has been able to improve her business and save more money for another business opportunity. She also feels as well that Ruma sales executives are really kind and really helpful.

Although she just joined Ruma four month ago, her track record in selling mobile airtime credits sales has been quite impressive because of the high demand from the customers for the mobile phone airtime credits, especially on the weekends. As the business grows, Linda needs to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to process more mobile airtime credits.  Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Linda improve her business and accordingly, her community, who needs access to such services. As seen in the photo, Linda is the one who is standing in her own stall - holding a Ruma poster. She will be very thankful for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in her community

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia is 58 years old and married with four children.

Celia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like canned goods, snack foods, detergent soap, shampoo, candies, milk, juice, etc. to sell.

Celia has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and earns additional  income from sewing.

Celia aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like canned goods, snack foods, detergent soap, shampoo, candies, milk, and juice to sell

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Luisa works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of ready to wear clothing business in the Philippines and earns additional income from pig fattening.  Luisa is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock of ready to wear to sell to her customers.

Luisa has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of ready to wear to sell to her customers

loans.name: Zilpa

texts.en:
Zilpa is a married woman with six children, four of whom attend school and two who are younger. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water.

She has operated a retail shop for the past two years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of transportation in her business. 

With the loan of 50,000 she wants to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Ana Irma

texts.es: Ana de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su casa, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro en el lugar que muestra la fotografía pero como no tiene de suficiente capital por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Ana is 35 years old and lives in her own home with her husband. She sells products for personal use and these sales allow her to meet some of the household bills. 

Ana would like to make home improvements by building a wall in the area you can see in the photograph, however she does not have enough capital to do this which is why she is applying for a loan. 

Ana will use this loan to buy cement, sand, bricks, sheets of iron and pay for labourers so that she and her family can live in greater comfort and security.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, sheets of iron and pay for labourers

loans.name: Jose Tulio

texts.es: Jose de 62 años de edad desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar la tierra, por lo que se dedica a cultivar maíz y frijol desde hace 20 años, con las ventas que realiza logra obtener mejores ingresos económicos y dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Él vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos,  Jose desea invertir en insumos para su cultivo ya que dentro de poco empieza la época de siembra, para ello solicita un crédito para invertir en: la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para seguir con su cultivo con el que espera mejorar las condiciones de vida de el y de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 62 years old. He learnt how to work the land from a young age and has been growing corn and beans for 20 years. With the sales he makes he is able to obtain a better income and provide his family with better living conditions.

Jose lives with his wife and his two children. He would like to buy supplies for his crops since the planting season will soon begin, which is why he is applying for a loan. He will use the loan to buy seeds, fertilisers, compost, pest control and improve the land you can see in the photograph so that he can continue with his crops in the hope of improving living conditions for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, compost, pest control and improve the land

loans.name: Allison Michelle

texts.es:
Responsable, entusiasta, amorosa, estudiosa y dedicada son unas de las cualidades de Allison, una joven de 19 años que día a día lucha por mejorar su calidad de vida. Actualmente, cursa segundo año de Administración turística y hotelera, carrera que la apasiona y la llena de ganas de salir a delante.
Allison solicita el financiamiento para la compra de una computadora con todos los accesorios, esta le será de gran utilidad, pues podrá valerse de esta herramienta en sus estudios. Ella es consciente de cuán importante es acceder a la educación superior en un país en vías de desarrollo como Nicaragua. Por eso, espera a mediano plazo desarrollarse en su carrera y a largo plazo llegar a crear su propia empresa.
texts.en:
Responsible, enthusiastic, loving, studious and dedicated are some of the qualities that describe Allison, a young woman of 19 who strives day after day to improve her quality of life. Allison is currently in her second year of Tourism and Hotel Administration, a course which she is passionate about and which fills her with the desire to get ahead. 

Allison is applying for a loan to buy a computer with all of the accessories which will be very useful as she can use it as a tool for her studies. She is aware of the importance of accessing tertiary education in a developing country such as Nicaragua and it is for this reason she hopes to develop her career in the medium term and in the long term create her own company.

loans.use: to buy a computer with all of the accessories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn, propane gas and limes

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica desde hace 10 años a la crianza de ganado, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado para poder continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria, 45, owns a house where she lives with her husband and son. She has been raising cattle for ten years. This activity has helped her to cover some of the home expenses.

Gloria is requesting a loan to buy cattle and continue with her business, which is her only source of income. This will result in a better quality of life for them.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Avita

texts.en:
Avita works hard to support her family. Avita is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

Avita has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

In the future, Avita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 36 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hija mujer de 20 años de edad, y su negocio es la venta de comida.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, independiente, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la localidad de ‘Sacaba’ una comunidad campesina que agrupa a restaurantes que se especializan en comida tradicional y donde se elabora la ‘chicha’ (bebida fermentada de maíz), de clima cálido semi tropical.
Maria es de tez morena, cabello largo trenzado, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general. Su vida la realiza con su pareja que trabaja en el interior y regresa al hogar cada 3 meses y su hija que estudia una carrera técnica, viven en una casa propia sin terminar de construir, hecha de ladrillo y cuenta con agua de pozo y electricidad. Su casa está compuesta por 2 cuartos, no tiene vidrios en las ventanas y la cocina, baño y lavandería no tiene agua. Su sueño es terminar de construir su casa, ella desea realizar la instalación de agua potable, en su cocina, baño y lavandería para proporcionar un futuro mejor a su familia. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que lleva construyendo su casa.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable, en su cocina, baño y lavandería para proporcionar una vivienda segura a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a 36-year-old woman. She lives with her partner and has a 20-year-old daughter. Maria works selling food. She is a good mother, and an entrepreneurial, independent, responsible and hardworking woman. She works in Sacaba, a community of farmers with many restaurants that offer traditional food and “chicha” (a beverage made with fermented corn). It has warm and semi-tropical weather.

Maria has a dark complexion, and long braided hair. She is short and her mother tongue is Quechua, which is spoken by locals. She speaks Spanish due to cultural reasons. She lives with her partner (who works in the interior of the country and comes home every three months) and her daughter (who studies at the technical school).

They live in a house they own, which they have not finished building yet. It is made of bricks and is served with electricity. They take the water from a well. Their house has two rooms. The windows do not have glasses and the kitchen, the bathroom and the laundry room do not have running water.

Her dream is to finish her house. She would like to have drinking water in the kitchen, the bathroom and the laundry room in order to offer her family a better future. This is her first loan with the institution, although she has been building her house for four years.

This is why Maria is requesting a loan to install drinking water in the kitchen, the bathroom and he laundry, and in that way give her family a safe home.

loans.use: to install drinking water in her kitchen, bathroom and laundry room.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy used clothing

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
As a married mother of six children, Nenita works hard to support her family.

She has a food-vending business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from pig fattening.  

Nenita is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business.

Nenita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria works hard to support her family. 

Maria is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. Maria has been in this business for 10 years now.

Maria requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell in her general store.

Maria would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.en:
Luciana is married and she has one child. 

Luciana started her kiosk in 2012 with her own working capital of $1,500.

She is  requesting a loan of $1,000 to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as noodles, cigarettes, coffee, shampoo, sweets, spices, detergent and other things to sell. She is happy with the loan offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. She said she will use the loan from Tuba Rai Metin to run her business bigger in the future.

loans.use: To buy noodles, cigarretes, coffee, shampoo, sweets, spices, detergent and other things to sell.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 29 years old, married, and has one child. Rosemarie works very hard to provide for the family.

Rosemarie runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, coffee, cereals, juice, milk, bath soap, shampoo, etc.  

Rosemarie requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

In the future, Rosemarie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Linda works hard to support her family.

She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending and raising livestock.

Linda is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to customers.

Linda has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah, 43, is a married woman with six children, three of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Sarah has a business selling nipa roofing in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years.

Sarah requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stocks of nipa roofing to sell. 

In the future, Sarah would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of nipa roofing to sell.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Lourdes works hard to support her family.

She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from a general store.  

Lourdes is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to customers.

Lourdes has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Aurora

texts.en:
Aurora works hard to support her family. Aurora is married and has a vegetable-vending business in the Philippines. Aurora has been in this business for three years now.

Aurora requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell.

In the future, Aurora would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.en:
Claudia is 64 years old and married. She has 12 children. Claudia works very hard to provide for them.

Claudia runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 25 years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, cooking oil, canned goods, detergent soap, noodles, etc.
 
Claudia requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Claudia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 33 years old, married, and has two children, one of whom is in school.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Mary Jane has been farming sugarcane for two years and also earns additional income from food vending.

Mary Jane is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Bethel

texts.en:
Bethel is 54 years old and married with one child in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Bethel runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF in other to purchase additional stock of groceries to sell. She has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soft drinks, canned goods, diapers and other groceries. 

In the future, Bethel would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of groceries to sell

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Mario, de 24 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, por situaciones económicas no pudo continuar, está soltero, nadie depende económicamente de él, pero aporta parte de sus ingresos a los gastos de la casa.

Mario, actualmente trabaja conduciendo una moto-taxi, transporta pasajeros, tiene dos años de dedicarse a este trabajo; anteriormente tenía su propio taller de enderezado y pintura de autos, pero la delincuencia no lo dejo trabajar.

Mario, ocupa el crédito para comprar una moto, para transportarse de su casa al lugar de trabajo, ya que tiene que caminar varios kilómetros, para llegar hasta donde deja guardada la moto-taxi.

En un futuro Mario, sueña con tener su propia moto taxi y asi tener su negocio propio.
texts.en: Mario is 24 years old. He studied up to ninth grade. Because of financial reasons, he was not able to continue studying. He is single. Nobody depends on him, but he helps with part of his income with household expenses. Currently, Mario is working as a driver of a motorcycle-taxi. He transports passengers. He has worked in this for two years. Previously, he had his own car auto body and paint shop, but because of criminality he could not continue working. Mario will use the loan to buy a motorcycle to transport himself form his house to his place of work, because he has to walk many kilometers to get to the place where he stores his motorcycle-taxi. In the future, Mario dreams of having his own motorcycle-taxi, and in this way have his own business.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa lives in Viqueque and most of her daily income is from selling chickens. She started to selling chickens in 2012 with her own working capital of $350.00. 

Josefa requested a loan from Tuba Rai Metin for $800.00, which she will use to buy more chickens. The loan will provide her with more working capital to buy more chickens in the future.

loans.use: to purchase chickens.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is a sari-sari (convenience) store owner from Leyte, Philippines. She is married and has nine children.

Rosario has operated her store for several years now but had to stop after it was ruined by a super typhoon a year ago. She was really sad about what happened to her business.

This time Rosario wants to avail herself of a loan from CEVI, a micro finance organization in the country, to start again with her business. A loan will be used to buy stock such as rice, noodles, canned goods, soap and detergents, bread and biscuits, cooking oil and condiments, among others. Rosario believes that this loan will enable her to earn an income through her business.

loans.use: to buy stock such as rice, noodles, canned goods, soap and detergents, bread and biscuits, cooking oil and condiments, among others

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 53 years old and married.

Josephine is in an agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.  Josephine has been raising pigs for ten years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Josephine would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Kanze

texts.en:
Kanze  is a married mother of five children, all of whom attend school. She lives at  a  rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense are school fees.

For over six years, she has operated an open-air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, charcoal and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, charcoal and cooking  fat

loans.name: Sergio Alejandro

texts.es:
Sergio es testigo directo que las oportunidades solo se presentan una vez en la vida, y que está en nosotros mismos, aprovecharlas o dejarlas ir. Ya que, este joven de apenas 22 años, es docente universitario y fotógrafo profesional, gracias  a que su carrera estudiada en Estados Unidos le ha  abierto muchas puertas en el campo laboral.  
El crédito lo utilizará para comprar un equipo fotográfico profesional, esto le será de gran utilidad, porque así podrá tener más ingresos y podrá ampliar sus clientes. Como todo buen fotógrafo amante del arte, no serán una dificultad la distancia para capturar una buena toma.
texts.en: Sergio is a direct testament to the opportunities that only present themselves once in a lifetime and for ourselves whether we take advantage of them or ignore them.. This young man who is barely 22 years old is a university professor and a professional photographer. This, thanks to his studies in the United States which have opened a lot of doors for him in the employment field. He will use the loan to buy professional photography equipment. This will be very useful as he will be able to have more income and increase his clients. As with all good photographers who love art, distance will not be a difficulty in capturing that good shot.

loans.use: to buy professional photography equipment.

loans.name: M. Younas

texts.en:
M. Younas owns an auto spare parts shop in the area of Lahore, Pakistan and lives near his shop. His shop is situated in the vehicle spare parts market and it is challenging for him to sell his products with all his competitors. This competition highly affects his daily sales. 

To grow his business and income and not be affected by the competitors, he decided to offer some additional, stylish spare parts. M. Younas hopes that this strategy will work positively and the customers will be attracted to his new products.

He cannot act upon his strategy without some capital, so he requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so he can buy some additional, stylish spare parts. 

M. Younas is a married person and he has to look after his young children and old parents also, but he hardly spends that time due to his business. 

M. Younas is tension free after receiving loan because the BRAC showed him a beam of hope in the darkness. He is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase stylish spare parts for auto repairing workshop.

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es:
Marta, de 56 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casada y su esposo trabaja vendiendo lotería desde hace 35 años, tiene 4 hijos, todos son mayores de edad, uno de ellos es maestro, solo su hija menor y su nieta viven con ella.

Marta, tiene 34 años de dedicarse a la elaboración de pupusas en su comunidad; anteriormente hacia panes con pollo, tortillas, pan y tamales.- Hoy en día, solamente hace pupusas todos los días en el mercado y en su casa hace sopa de mondongo los días Domingos.

El crédito lo utilizara para comprar una vaca, ya que su esposo también se dedica a la ganadería, también desea invertir una parte en la pupusería, para poder vender más y obtener más ganancias.

En un futuro su sueño es colocar un local más grande, donde sus clientes se sientan más cómodos y expandirse en otros mercados más cercanos.
texts.en:
Marta is 56 years old and she studied up to Grade 6. She is married and her husband has worked selling lottery tickets for 35 years. She has 4 children, all of them adults. One of them is a teacher and only her youngest daughter and a grandchild live with them.


Marta has been working making pupusas in her community for 34 years. Before that she made chicken sandwiches, tortillas, bread and tamales. Today she only makes pupusas every day in the market and in her house she makes tripe soup every Sunday.

She will use the loan to buy a cow as her husband also raises livestock. She also wants to invest part of it into her pupusa business to be able to sell more and make more profit. In the future her dream is to open a larger stand where all her customers can sit comfortably and expand into other nearby markets.




En un futuro su sueño es colocar un local más grande, donde sus clientes se sientan más cómodos y expandirse en otros mercados más cercanos.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay medical expenses and buy medicine.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi, 41, is a sari-sari store owner residing in Leyte, Philippines. She is married and has three children. Naomi has operated her sari-sari or variety store for more than 10 years now. This is her main source of income. Naomi is asking to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, bread, candies, and snack foods among others. This loan will enable her to improve her stocks thus attracting more buyers in her store. Naomi dreams of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, bread, candies, and snack foods among others

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover medical expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase used clothing and pieces of "pagne" cloth

loans.name: Torees Group

texts.en:
Salah, who is in her mid 30s, is single with four children; one of them is still in school and the other three are grown-ups.  She has been a food vendor for three years now. She works from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Salah's fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to keep on increasing the food stock and started selling water, and she has paid back all her loans successfully. She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for their support. She used the profit to pay school fees, to pay for loan dues and covered household expenses.  She will use this loan to increase the food stock and serve more customers. She dreams of renovating her house.

Salah will share this loan with her loan group "Torees," which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase the food stock and serve more customers.

loans.name: Tarcela

texts.en:
Tarcela is 56 years old, married and has four children, one of whom is in school.

Tarcela is in an agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Tarcela has been raising pigs for eleven years now, and has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Tarcela would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Santos Rosibel

texts.es:
Santos, de 29 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura, tiene una hija de 4 años, actualmente está viviendo en casa de su  hermana.

Santos, se dedica a vender ropa al por menor, tiene 6 años de dedicarse a este negocio, el cual aprendió con una amiga.

El crédito será utilizado para comprar más ropa para su negocio y de está manera sostener y poder comprar todo lo que su hija necesitará para asistir a la escuela.

El sueño de Santos, es que su hija estudie y se gradue de una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Santos is 29 years old and studied up to Grade 9. She is married, her husband works in agriculture. She has a 4 year old daughter and she is currently living in the house of her sister.


Santos works selling all types of clothing retail and has done this for 6 years. She learned the business from a friend. The loan will be used to buy more clothing for her business. In this way she will earn her living and be able to buy all her daughter needs to go to school. Santo's dream is for her daughter to study and graduate from a university.


El crédito será utilizado para comprar más ropa para su negocio y de está manera sostener y poder comprar todo lo que su hija necesitará para asistir a la escuela.



El sueño de Santos, es que su hija estudie y se gradue de una carrera universitaria.

loans.use: to buy more clothing for her business.

loans.name: Kong

texts.en:
Kong, 48, is originally from Pursat Province. He has six children in total; three are married and live independently, while the other three are single and live under his support. To make a living, he manages and operates a farming business and grows and sells rice to the local dealers. So far, he has been in this business for eight years and earns, on average, USD $3 a day.

Kong is residing a little bit far from the water source, so it is hard and time consuming for him to get the water. Due to this reason, he is applying for a Kiva loan to dig a pond for household use. With the support of this loan, he hopes that he can get the water to use more easily and spend shorter time doing so than before. He is thankful for the lenders for their financial support toward poor people.

loans.use: to dig a pond for household water use

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline works hard to support her family. Evangeline is married and has a fish-vending business in the Philippines.

Evangeline requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell to her customers.

Evangeline has been in this business for 24 years now.

Evangeline would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Melvin

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Melvin works hard to support her family.

She has a business of making native bags in the Philippines. Melvin is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy raw materials for her native bags business.

Melvin has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF, and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make native bags

loans.name: Oscar Leonel

texts.es:
En la pequeña granja de Oscar podemos apreciar los grandes y rojos tomates que adornan la hortaliza, este hombre de 54 años de edad lleva 30 años dedicándose a la agricultura, empieza su día muy temprano para aprovechar la luz de la mañana y así cuidar de sus saludables vegetales, acompañado de su esposa y sus tres hijos.
Oscar anhela ampliar su área de siembra, para poder ofertar su producto a más consumidores y crecer como agricultor. Por este motivo él ha solicitado un crédito para adquirir fertilizantes solubles y otros productos agroquímicos e incrementar su  mano de obra, lo cual le proporcionara una mejor oportunidad de vida a él, su familia y su comunidad.
texts.en: On Oscar's small farm we can appreciate the large red tomatoes that adorn his vegetable gardens. This 54 year old man has spent 30 years of his life working in agriculture. He starts his day very early to take advantage of the morning light and take care of his delicious vegetables aided by his wife and 3 children. Oscar wishes to expand the area he plants to be able to offer his products to more consumers and grow as a farmer. For this reason he is requesting a loan to acquire liquid fertilizer and other agro=chemical [products and increase his manpower. This will provide him with better opportunities in his life and that of his family and community.

loans.use: to acquire liquid fertilizer and other agro-chemical products,

loans.name: Scholar

texts.en:
Scholar is married with one child who is too young for schooling. She lives at a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses is food.

Scholar has operated a salon business for the last two years, serving ladies and women in the community. She mentioned seasonality as a major challenge in her business.

With the loan of 40,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase more cosmetics for resale. She decided to join Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics for resale

loans.name: Teresinha

texts.en:
An $800 loan is offered to Teresinha to improve her business. Teresinha lives in Viqueque; she is married and she has three children. Most of her daily income is from selling chickens, so she is still happy to do her business. She started her business in 2012, with her own working capital of $250. 

She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more chickens. With her husband, she was going to add money to their principal amount to buy more chickens, because it has become their activity. With this loan, she will manage her business.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Zhiydekul

texts.ru: Жийдекуль 51 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Жийдекуль - среднее образование, у нее большой трудовой стаж, с 1982 года. Ежемесячная заработная плата Жийдекуль 7,700 сом (KGS). Супруг занимается частным извозом пассажиров. Жийдекуль решила в этом году отремонтировать ее дом, поэтому она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку цемента, кирпичей, досок. В будущем свои доходы Жийдекуль планирует направлять на обучение ее внучки.
texts.en: Zhiydekul is 51, married, and is raising three children with her spouse. She has a high school education and has been working since 1982. She earns 7,700 som (KGS) per month. Her spouse is a private driver. Zhiydekul decided to remodel her house this year, and that is why she applied for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy cement, bricks and planks. In the future she plans to use her income for her granddaughter's education.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks and planks to repair her house

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.en:
Jacinto works hard to support her family. Jacinto is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 4 years now.

Jacinto requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food vending business.

In the future, Jacinto would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Madelyn

texts.en:
Madelyn is 35 years old and has three children. She is married, and two of her children are in school.

Madelyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Madelyn requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Madelyn has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Madelyn would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Gina is 33 years old and has two children who are in school.

Gina has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store. Gina has been in this business for 12 years. 

In the future, Gina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 55 years old and single. 

Leonila is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Leonila has been in the pig fattening business for five years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Leonila would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Melfa

texts.en:
Melfa is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 31 years old and two of her children are currently in school.

Melfa has a business buying and selling used clothing in the Philippines. Melfa requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more used clothing to sell to her customers.

Melfa has been in this business for 14 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more used clothing to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Halimah

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Meet Halimah again, one of Ruma's agents who has been with Ruma for around 2 years. She feels happy because since joining Ruma her business has improved very much. Halimah feels that she gives a good contribution to her community through her small business. 

Halimah lives in Rancabungur Village, West Bogor, West Java. She lives there with her husband and her two daughters. She owns a stall where she sells many things. She sells daily consumer products, snacks and drinks, mobile phone airtime and serves utility bill payments in her stall.

As the business grows, Halimah needs to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to process more mobile airtime credits. Knowing its importance, your loan will be very useful to help Halimah improve her business and accordingly, her community who needs access to such services. 

As seen in the photo, Halimah is the one who is standing in her own small stall. She will be very thankful for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in her community

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John lives on a hilltop in Siongiroi, Kenya with his wife and their children. From his small, but immaculately clean mud house, he can see a bright future, thanks to the income he earns through practicing mixed farming. John passionately loves dairy farming and has nicknamed one of his cows. 

Because of his immense farming knowledge, he has turned his farmland into a resource and agricultural center university. Here, hundreds turn up to get trained in the hope that they will replicate his farming model in their own farmland. However, the biggest challenge he faces is satisfying the demand for milk in his village. The demand is overwhelming. 

John is seeking a loan to buy another dairy cow. He believes that with the loan, he will be able to improve his living conditions and be able to secure the future of his children. Having gone through training with Juhudi Kilimo, he is confident that the skills he has acquired will help him to increase his business and be able to pay back the loan. John is confident that if you invest in his dream, you will be impacting the life of his family and especially his children.

loans.use: to buy a quality breed of dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a buffalo for producing milk.

loans.name: Sinta

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Meet one of our borrowers, Sinta. Sinta lives in West Bogor, West Java. She lives there with her husband. She is working as a factory worker and she owns a stall where she sells daily consumer products, small snacks and mobile airtime credits. She joined Ruma a year ago and she feels happy because she can save more money. She feels that Ruma's service is satisfying.

She was excited to become a Ruma borrower because she wanted to learn to start a business selling mobile phone airtime credits. Because her small business is improving, she wants to continue it. She feels happy that she can gives access to those who need it in her community.

As the business runs, Sinta is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to process more mobile transactions. As seen in the photo, Sinta is the one who is standing in her stall. She is thankful for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in her community.

loans.name: Cesar Candelario

texts.es:
Cesar, de 54 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, está acompañado, su pareja trabaja vendiendo ropa y calzado en cantones, tiene 2 hijos, el mayor estudia hasta cuarto grado y el menor está en kínder.

Cesar, trabaja en una alcaldía desde hace 6 años.

Cesar, utilizará el crédito para comprar pliegos de lamina, que servirán para colocar el techo de su vivienda, de esta manera dará a su familia un lugar digno y seguro para vivir.

Cesar, desea tener una casa propia, donde vivan junto a su familia y además, anhela ver crecer a sus hijos y darles una buena educación.
texts.en:
Cesar is 54 years old. He studied up until fourth grade, he has a partner who works selling clothes and underwear in the region. 

Cesar has two children, the older child is in fourth grade and the younger is in kindergarten. Cesar has been working in a municipality for the last six years. 

Cesar will use the loan to buy plastic roof sheeting, which he'll use to secure the roof of his house. In this way, Cesar can give his family a dignified and secure place to live. 

Cesar's wish is to have his own home, where he can live together with his family. Furthermore, Cesar longs to see his children grow up with a good education.

loans.use: to buy plastic roof sheeting

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: LA SEÑORA MARIA ES HABITANTE DE CHINANDEGA ELLA CUENTA CON UN NEGOCIO DE VENTA DE PLASTICOS DESDE HACE 17AÑOS ELLA SOLICITA FINANCIAMIENTO CADA DOS MESES PARA COMPRA DE MERCADERIA PARA SU NEGOCIO Y POCO A POCO IR AUMENTANDO SU INVENTARIO ES UNA MUJER TRABAJADORA QUE INICIA SUS LABORES DE LAS 7;00 AM A LAS 5:00PM DE LUNES A DOMINGO ES UNA MUJER TRABAJADORA EMPRENDEDORA QUE TRABAJA FUERTE PARA PODER SACAR ADELANTE A SU FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Maria lives in Chinadega and has been running a business selling plastics for the last 17 years. 

Maria seeks financing every two months in order to buy stock for her business and hence little by little expand her inventory. She is a hard-working woman who starts her work every morning at 7am and finishes at 5pm, Monday to Sunday. 

Maria is an enterprising business-woman who works hard to support her family to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy barrels, containers, and empty sacks to sell.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosalie is 31 years old and all of her children are in school.

Rosalie has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Rosalie has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Bebeana

texts.en:
Bebeana is 56 years old, married and she has nine children, one of whom is in school.

Bebeana is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Bebeana requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Bebeana has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Bebeana would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina es reconocida en su comunidad por ser una persona muy amable y sincera, ella tiene 26 años de edad y vive con su familia en el municipio de Santa Cruz la Laguna.
